txt.en:
'I have been monitoring the patterns of the tomb-robbers here. When they come, when they go, who is here and when. There are patterns in everything. In Rantost, the patterns run deep. 

'It is always the same robbers I see around this camp. There are a few that travel on the boats to get new relics, but they do not come ashore. The robbers who are here do not change.

'If you were to defeat a number of them, it would take time before any would notice and be able to come and support. This would give us the opening we need to strike.'
'Once all the pieces are in place, we will be able to signal the Rangers to strike. This was an important accomplishment.'
'If we strike quickly, the island will be mostly undefended for a short window of time.'
Tomb-robbers are threatening the peace of Evendim, despoiling the ancient sites of the DÃºnedain.
Talk to Eliot Bencroft on Rantost
Tomb-robbers have established a camp on Rantost, an island north of Tinnudir on Lake Nenuial.\n\nEliot Bencroft wants you to defeat a few tomb-robbers.
Eliot Bencroft is at the south-east corner of Rantost.\n\nEliot Bencroft will be pleased to hear the island has been thinned.
